data.suggestion: "Laura's Pet" Redux but with a lusty fem Keith in Laura's position and male Laura in Keith's position.
Flora asks Trace for a hair cut. Trace uses magic but the spell does not distinguish between hair and fur.

Trace's Promise: After waking from a nightmare about Flora, Trace embraces his sleeping wife and unborn child protectively, whispering into her ear that he will never let anything hurt them. Not even himself.
Magic gone wrong: Seraphina has become human, and Sealeen and Landen are Adrakists!
Templars attack the Tiger village and the explorers must defend their new home - but are they equally committed?
Natani and Yena from Join the Pack! making manly poses together
Everyone in the manor (including human Reni) spend a day making arts and crafts in the main hall.
Mike meets Carver, and tried to warn him about the gender-swap shenanigans that happen in sketches. Carver is dismissive, so a watching Nora changes Carver.
Trace and Flora enact the balcony scene from Romeo and Juliet
Natani dressed as Red Savarin, and Keith dressed as Elh Melizée from Solatorobo
Raine in a maid outfit
Smug Bat Keidran
Traditional snow leopard celebration
How Mike got the scar on his face.
We see what Trace and Flora were really doing in that tent on their first night together... Twister!
YoungNat takes control and teases Keith from the shower
"Grand Templar Mary Siverlock learns that Eris has broken into a Keidran village where a peace agreement has been made and is not happy about it "
Tom catches Nora trying to edit the comic!
Snow leopard snowball fight! (Northern explorers get into a snowball fight with the snow leopards!)
Good morning Laura
While reading one of Eric's books about magic, Kathrin unwittingly revived her dolls of TK cast.
Transformation lapse of Raine
Merveille Million from Solatorobo
Landen And Madelyn accidentally make a coffee so strong, it turns into a coffee elemental.
Mike's family: where are they now?
Angel Flora fighting an out of control Demon Tiger Trace to bring him back to his senses
Tigress Trace in her Winter Coating.
Laura age chart that includes her elderly form (assuming she never died).
Beach party trio redraw
Kat, Maren or Natani as Laura Croft, Tomb Raider
Sports car. Sythe as race winner. Nibbly and Maren as race girls
Nora checking out Mike’s male and female forms side by side
Maddie tugs on one of Flora's antenna, causing Flora's tail (and butt) to lift up suddenly. (sequel to Flora's Antenna)
Zen and Kat on a dinner date run into Brutus and Clovis's "sister"
Keith and Natani making one another flower crowns and basking in a sunspot now that winter's finally over
Flora relaxing in a field
The tiger tribe show the explorers how they celebrate the changing of the season! with some of them wanting them to join in the celebration as well.
The dress Kat was making for Mike in "Dress Time" is finally finished. Only one problem; Mike has already switched back to being male! Though the dress still looks... surprisingly pretty good on him.
Squirrelified Maren Sequel: Maren has the urge to steal everyone's clothing, and starts with Scythe.
Kat gets hit with the heart's desire spell to show a hunkier more forthcoming Eric
Dragon Nora flying alongside a Lockheed/Martin Sr-71 blackbird
In the rabbit village Mike is bowled over and bunny piled by some curious young rabbits.
Nib Nab 5: Flora and Trace
Madelyn Reference Sheet
What if Trace ran into Laura after getting his memory wiped, and fell in love with her instead of Flora?
A cute scene. Brutus give Fem Clovis (sister) a kiss
Baby Nibbly
Keith performs a sexy striptease for Natani.
Kat against the glass: Flora edition
Grand Templar Laura and the Slaver Sisters Kathrin and Flora have tea when Laura takes notice of a special Basitin slave boy
Laura as a breakfast cereal mascot.
Clovis, bruts and calver banished in the phantom zone (old school)
Tom’s take on Animal Crossing’s Isabel
Maren and Sythe as Belle and the Beast dancing in the ballroom from the film.
Maeve Noms Roan’s Tail, causing him to either have a heart attack because he nearly killed someone so adorable, or throw his fireball vertically, causing it to land on him."
Little Kat and Eric playing doctor
Youngtani in Clovis's body runs into Brutus, and tries to embarrass Clovis more by acting and talking flirty. The real Clovis fights to get some words in, giving Brutus some slightly mixed signals.
A Pinup of Loona in Hell from "Helluva Boss"
Zen's Reference Sheet
An angry Raine (Halfkind form) shouts at Euchre and Mary for abandoning and neglecting her, respectively, declaring that she's proud of who she is-human, halfkind and keidran.
Sequel to "long haired Kat". Kat shows her long hair to her friends and all of them are shocked and surprised about it. And some of them are blushing too.
"Preparing for the Saria and Trace wedding. Saria asks Rose to be her bridesmaid. Rose doubts this is a good idea but Saria convinces her. "
Zen in meditation and the side effects of the mind link
A remake of "first hugs" of Natani and Keith from page 235.
I want Trace and Flora on a motorcycle riding through the mountains in the spring.
Kathrin cheering up Mike after a bad day on Eric's boat.
Flora "Deeper Stretch" Remake
A look into the sexy Keidren all-male bath house.
Sythe meets squirrel maren, he isn’t sure how to feel about the new change, but his tail is wagging for some reason
Keith and Natani are getting very intimate with each other when they are interrupted by Trace walking into the room.
Keith and Laura fiery tango dance.
"It's, Its a Dinosaur." Zen as Dr. Grant, and Raine as Dr. Sattler in a TK version of the welcome to Jurassic Park scene.
"Fatal Tail-Nom
"Dog commands?" Maren asks. "From Rose? What, like sit?" Wolf-form Raine suddenly sits on command with front paws raised like a dog, looking confused.
Sythe in regalia providing diplomatic relations "advice" to the Basitin trio. Lynn is studiously taking notes, but the other two are more suspicious.
The young Rose and Saria sit drunk in the wine cellar and celebrate Rose's birthday.
Natani and Keith as the main characters in a film noir detective story. One as the hard-boiled private eye and the other as the ingenue or femme fatale.
Nibbly somehow surprises Sythe with a bundle of baby squirrelies. Shock gives way to undenying adoration. Maren resists the sickeningly sweet cuteness.
How would the fight between Trace and Mary have gone if she had somehow reflected his spell back at him?
Noras reaction to missing her chance with trace (again)
Raine ( human ) and Maren posing in their swimsuits. As Maren pulls Raine in to get ‘closer’, Maren shows off a seductive smile and Raine with a shy one.
Behind the scenes: Maren and Rain talk about getting changed into Keidran while Karen almost passes out in the background from hyperspeed changing her bikini to get the colorchange
Drunk Natani sticking out the top of a limo with a bottle vodka down a neon street.
Kat discovers she is able to swap Mikes sex
Adelaide and Adira commiserating with each other about the lack of grandchildren to spoil in their future
AU: Keith And Natani meet as kids. One has a crush on the other!
Flora(Ori) and the Blind Forest
Maren with an evil face holding a tiny Sythe in her hand. Maybe Mrs. Nibbly next to him for comparison?
Keith and Alaric meeting for the first time
